entity.spellbound.wail_of_the_she_wolf: Wail Of The She Wolf Projectile
book.spellbound.name: Book of Spells
book.spellbound.landing_text: Welcome to the Book of Spells!
book.spellbound.getting_started.title: Getting Started
book.spellbound.magic_mushrooms.title: Magic Mushrooms
book.spellbound.spells.title: Spells
book.spellbound.tablets.title: Tablets
book.spellbound.getting_started.page0: Welcome to the world of Spellbound!$(br2)To get started, grab some brown and red mushrooms, a bunch of iron and gold nuggets, and craft some $(l:root/magic_mushrooms)Magic Mushrooms$(). Once you've done that, you can mate the mushrooms into other mushroom variants.$(br2)Finally, you can combine the mushrooms with $(l:root/tablets)tablets$() and other materials to create some $(l:root/spells)spells$() for you to use!
book.spellbound.magic_mushrooms.page0: Mushrooms are one of the base parts for $(l:root/spells)spells$(). The two base mushrooms can be created through crafting, as seen on the right.$(br2)Different mushroom types can be mated to produce new mushroom types. To do this, place the two mushroom types close to each other, leaving one block in the center.
book.spellbound.magic_mushrooms.page2: White mushrooms are special in that they effectively clone whatever other mushroom they are paired with. In other words:$(br2)White + <Mushroom>$(br)  -> <Mushroom>
book.spellbound.magic_mushrooms.page3: Mating mushrooms. The empty space in the center is where the new mushroom will grow.
book.spellbound.magic_mushrooms.page4: The combinations for mating are as follows:$(br2)- Speckled Red + Speckled Orange$(br)  -> Speckled Pink$(br)- Speckled Red + Speckled Pink$(br)  -> Speckled Blue$(br)- Speckled Red + Speckled Blue$(br)  -> Purple$(br)- Speckled Orange + Speckled Pink$(br)  -> Yellow$(br)- Speckled Orange + Speckled Blue$(br)  -> Orange
book.spellbound.magic_mushrooms.page5: - Speckled Pink + Speckled Blue$(br)  -> Light Blue$(br)- Speckled Red + Light Blue$(br)  -> Gold$(br)- Speckled Orange + Purple$(br)  -> Rainbow$(br)- Speckled Pink + Yellow$(br)  -> Gray$(br)- Speckled Blue + Orange$(br)  -> Black
book.spellbound.spells.page0: Spells are the main part of Spellbound. Most spells need to be charged up for a few seconds before they are used up. Every spell has a different crafting process and effect, all of which are described on the following pages.
book.spellbound.tablets.page0: Tablets are one of the base parts for $(l:root/spells)spells$(). All tablets are created from base tablets, the same items that were also used to create this book.$(br2)These base tablets can then be augmented with $(l:root/magic_mushrooms)Magic Mushrooms$() to produce more specialized tablets, which serve as the base for $(l:root/spells)spells$().
book.spellbound.tablets.page1: All tablets use clay bases for balance.
book.spellbound.spell.icy_grip: Damages and extinguishes the target. Snows on the area around the target as well.
book.spellbound.spell.icicle: Damages and extinguishes the target. Snows on the area around the target as well. Stronger than Icy Grip.
book.spellbound.spell.cold_blast: Damages and extinguishes the target. Snows on the area around the target as well. Stronger than Icy Grip and Icicle.
book.spellbound.spell.cold_shield: Applying this spell cancels all cold spells that hit you.
book.spellbound.spell.flaming_hands: Damages the target. Lights up the area around the target in flames.
book.spellbound.spell.fireball: Damages the target. Causes an explosion at the impact position.
book.spellbound.spell.greater_fireball: Damages the target. Causes an explosion at the impact position. Stronger than Fireball.
book.spellbound.spell.fire_shield: Applying this spell cancels all fire spells that hit you.
book.spellbound.spell.lightning_bolt: Damages and weakens the target. Calls down a lightning strike on the target as well.
book.spellbound.spell.area_lightning: Damages, weakens and calls down lightning strikes on the target and all entities in a large radius around it.
book.spellbound.spell.lightning_shield: Applying this spell cancels all lightning spells that hit you.
book.spellbound.spell.summon_wolf: Summons a tamed wolf at the impact position.
book.spellbound.spell.summon_skeleton: Summons a skeleton at the impact position.
book.spellbound.spell.summon_wither_skel: Summons a wither skeleton at the impact position.
book.spellbound.spell.surge_shield: Prevents surges. Surges are rare negative side effects that can occur when using a spell.
book.spellbound.spell.spell_shield: Combines the effects of Cold Shield, Fire Shield, Lightning Shield and Surge Shield.
book.spellbound.spell.archmagic: Applying this spell allows you to instantly cast any amount of spells for a short time.
book.spellbound.spell.disintegrate: Causes a lot of damage on the target.
book.spellbound.spell.elemental_fury: Combines the effects of Cold Blast, Greater Fireball and Area Lightning.
book.spellbound.spell.wail_of_the_she_wo: Once caused a distorting wail that killed anything in a large radius. The wail is now gone, but the deadly power remains.
book.spellbound.spell.panic_room: Encapsulates you in a temporary bedrock room.
book.spellbound.spell.bedrock_wall: Summons a temporary bedrock wall right in front of you.
book.spellbound.spell.obsidian_wall: Summons a temporary obsidian wall right in front of you.
book.spellbound.spell.stone_wall: Summons a stone wall right in front of you.
book.spellbound.spell.breach: Breaches blocks it hits, and removes Spell Shield from the target if present.
book.spellbound.spell.color_spray: Randomly dyes wool and sheep in a small radius. Blinds the target.
book.spellbound.spell.dimension_door: Randomly teleports you a few hundred blocks in the direction you're facing.
book.spellbound.spell.cookie_chest: Spawns a chest full of cookies. What more do you want?
book.spellbound.spell.chaos: Drastically increases the target's chance for surges. Surges are rare negative side effects that can occur when using a spell.
book.spellbound.spell.miscast_magic: Disables the ability to use spells for the target.
book.spellbound.spell.fish_form: Makes you able to breath underwater.
book.spellbound.spell.advance_time: Advances time in an area around you.
book.spellbound.spell.instant_levitation: Instantly increases your altitude a bit.
book.spellbound.spell.torchlight: Places down a torch only if needed.
